thread.title: 'Bridget Jones's Baby' to release next year
thread.title_full: 'Bridget Jones's Baby' to release next year - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: 'Bridget Jones's Baby' to release next year
text:
London: The third instalment of Renee Zellweger-starrer "Bridget Jones" movie series is scheduled to arrive in North America in September next year.


Renee Zellweger. Pic/Santa Banta 
Universal Pictures and Working Title have announced that the dramedy (drama and comedy) "Bridget Jones's Baby" is slated to arrive in US on September 16, 2016, reports aceshowbiz.com.
As production continues, Zellweger was spotted on the set of the movie at the Borough Markets here, filming two different scenes.
In one scene, the actress was seen carrying a Christmas tree while walking down the snowy street. She wore a thick grey cardigan over a blue sweater which covered her fake baby bump.
In another scene, Zellweger looked elegant wearing a blue lace dress and a pair of black stockings.
Unlike the previous one, in this scene, Zellweger's Bridget Jones was not pregnant. She approached a street vendor and started a conversation with him.
"Bridget Jones's Baby" marks Zellweger's third essay at reprising her role as the title character following 2001's "Bridget Jones's Diary" and 2004's "Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason".
